summary: Doctors Herbert West and Dan Cain discover the secret to creating human life and proceed to create a perfect woman from dead tissue.
cast: Jeffrey Combs|Bruce Abbott|Claude Earl Jones|Fabiana Udenio|David Gale|Kathleen Kinmont|Mel Stewart|Irene Cagen|Michael Strasser|Mary Sheldon|Marge Turner|Johnny Legend|David Bynum|Noble Craig|Kim Parker|Charles Schneider|Rebeca Scott|Jay Evans|Fabian Alomar
title: La novia de Re-Animator
